MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL63 postcode area of Ty Croes affecting properties in Llanfaelog surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.09PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional resources required onsite and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.13PM on 24th February 2021.
